DefaultReaderConfiguration.preQueryCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Event e WHERE e.ID > ?
DefaultReaderConfiguration.queryString: SELECT e.CreationDate AS AlertTime, e.ID, e.ComputerName, e.ComputerIP, e.LoggedInUser, et.Description as EventTypeDescription, COALESCE( ( SELECT etp.name + '=' + ep.value + '; ' FROM EventParameter (NOLOCK) ep INNER JOIN EventTypeParameter (NOLOCK) etp ON etp.ID = ep.ParameterTypeID WHERE ep.EventID = e.ID ORDER BY etp.ParameterOrder FOR XML PATH('') ), '' ) AS EventParameters FROM Event (NOLOCK) e INNER JOIN EventType (NOLOCK) et ON (e.TypeID=et.ID) WHERE e.ID > ? ORDER BY e.ID

string.toolTipText: Enter the SanDisk CMC server's hostname to read from.
Enter the SanDisk CMC server's instance name to read from (if the database is on an instance).
Enter the SanDisk CMC server's port number.
Enter the SanDisk CMC server's database protocol.
Enter the SanDisk CMC database connection options.
Enter the SanDisk CMC database username.

password.toolTipText: Enter the SanDisk CMC database password.

string.toolTipText: Enter the number of seconds between queries.

boolean.toolTipText: Enable to account for Database for being in UTC
Enable to account for Daylight Savings Time when appropriate

string.toolTipText: JDBC Driver class for SanDisk CMC Database
Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data.

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data.

select.toolTipText: The data output this reader feeds.

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning: Disable, Device certificate has expired
UserDisable: Disable, User reached maximum number of allowed login attempts
FastPattern.pattern: \tDisable\tDescription=User reached maximum number of allowed login attempts.;
